ProjectTitle: Development of novel membrane chromatography platform for viral vector purification
InitialFeedbackHistory:
20/01/2025
Preservation: Please note that RDR is a data repository intended for data publishing, this will also ensure preservation of your data, but RDR can't be used for preservation alone, see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr. For data that you can't share (e.g. data underlying patents), please consult the storage guide to find other solutions: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en. Also note that repositories assign a PID upon data deposit, RDR uses DOIs.
label: good with suggestions
